sailpoint.object

Class Reason

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      • sailpoint.object.Reason
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sailpoint.tools.MessageKeyHolder, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject

    public class Reason
extends AbstractXmlObject
implements sailpoint.tools.MessageKeyHolder
    Simple XML object used to store a message key and parameters used when rendering a Recommendation. The Reason object is a localizable representation of the Reasons a decision was made in a Recommendation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
